div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 578 Ljubuski, c. 18 km. from the coast, (621) Bosnia, Yugoslavia, before 1902 Burial: 2nd-1st cent. B.C. (T) Contents: 20 AR Apollonia, Illyria: 6 dr. Dyrrhachium 14 dr. Disposition: Belgrade 2; Klostermuseum, Humac 4 Patsch, Bosnische Mitt. 1902, pp. 64-9
